软件包 com.jdon.strutsutil

类摘要
FormBeanUtil 宸ュ风被锛稿ActionForm Model涔绫荤宸ュ风 Copyright: Jdon.com Copyright (c) 2003 Company:
ForwardAction default action, if use BaseAction, we do not need create a new action for a forward function; sample:
InitPlugIn JdonFramework configuration starter.
ModelBaseAction  
ModelDispAction 涓ㄦ剧ずModel绫汇? 涓哄ㄨ捣瑙锛璁剧涓?釜绫汇?跺ョ瀛哄躲?requestnocache拌〃绀哄け缂瀛哄躲?modelDispAction.do?
ModelListAction batch query action
ModelListForm Model collection class that will be iterated by jsp this is a subclass of struts's ActionForm it include all model colletion that fit for query condition this class always collaborate with the concrete class of ModelListAction this class must be configured in struts-config.xml
ModelSaveAction Accept the datas that user submited, and handle them to service layer, service maybe persistence them. it is just like a handler. all functions delegate Modelhandler configure in jdonframework.xml: notie: the action parameter of the ModelForm(ActionForm) must be: 1. create , this class will call the create method defined in jdonframework.xml 2. edit , this class will call the edit method defined in jdonframework.xml 3. delete, this class will call the delete method defined in jdonframework.xml if not above, this class will call the action's value method of the service interface. example: action's value : deleteAll so, your service interface must havs a method: public void deleteAll(EventModel em); this class will directly call the deleteAll method of the service.
ModelViewAction this class can be invoked in browser's url this class will push create/insert view page or editable view page.
ServiceMethodAction Command pattern for service invoke sample: browser url: /aaa.do?
ServiceMethodSimpleAction  
ViewForm
